name: asdf
description: Manage multiple runtime versions with a single CLI tool, extendable via plugins

subcommands.name: add
subcommands.description: Add a plugin

subcommands.name: list
subcommands.description: List installed plugins
subcommands.usage:
asdf plugin list [--urls] [--refs]
asdf plugin list all

subcommands.name: remove
subcommands.description: Remove plugin and package versions

subcommands.name: update
subcommands.description: Update a plugin
subcommands.usage:
asdf plugin update <name> [<git-ref>]
asdf plugin update --all

subcommands.name: install
subcommands.description: Install all the package versions listed in the .tool-versions file
subcommands.usage:
asdf install
asdf install <name>
asdf install <name> <version>
asdf install <name> latest[:<version>]

subcommands.name: uninstall
subcommands.description: Remove a specific version of a package

subcommands.name: current
subcommands.description: Display current version set

subcommands.name: where
subcommands.description: Display install path for an installed or current version

subcommands.name: which
subcommands.description: Display the path to an executable

subcommands.name: local
subcommands.description: Set the package local version

subcommands.name: global
subcommands.description: Set the package global version

subcommands.name: shell
subcommands.description: Set the package version to `ASDF_${LANG}_VERSION` in the current shell

subcommands.name: latest
subcommands.description: Show latest stable version of a package / all packages

subcommands.name: list
subcommands.description: List installed versions of a package

subcommands.name: help
subcommands.description: Output documentation for plugin and tool

subcommands.name: exec
subcommands.description: Executes the command shim for current version

subcommands.name: env
subcommands.description: Runs util (default: `env`) inside the environment used for command shim execution

subcommands.name: info
subcommands.description: Print OS, Shell and ASDF debug information

subcommands.name: reshim
subcommands.description: Recreate shims for version of a package

subcommands.name: shim-versions
subcommands.description: List the plugins and versions that provide a command

subcommands.name: update
subcommands.description: Update asdf

tldr:
> Command-line interface for managing versions of different packages.
> More information: <https://asdf-vm.com>.

- List all available plugins:

`asdf plugin list all`

- Install a plugin:

`asdf plugin add {{name}}`

- List all available versions for a package:

`asdf list all {{name}}`

- Install a specific version of a package:

`asdf install {{name}} {{version}}`

- Set global version for a package:

`asdf global {{name}} {{version}}`

- Set local version for a package:

`asdf local {{name}} {{version}}`
